body:
Radio2009 dude just use 1-3*s instead of being carried by Castoria.
FGOs gameplay isn't the issue it's that the game has no replayable they're making the UI worse everyday and the new player experience is shit. If I didn't learn that shit gets real at Camelot if you don't get carried I would have quit at Septem.
Also can I just say every unit getting battery is kind of lame, they could just mix it up with NP Gen up since having to fight for your NP is way more fun than click button get NP, and stuff like that should have been rare to begin with.
Woah, wasn't expecting to see a knight of Catarina here, truly a cultured man. To whom I toast!
FGO gameplay just didn't age well, tbh. It's really being carried by the story and waifus.
That cover is something else
I just know that there are someone else who torture themselves collecting waifus tho the gameplay is awfully shit.
I mean... the gameplay of FGO is pretty mundane.  Story and waifu are great tho.  But gameplay is old and boring.  All I ever see is people complaining about farming and shit rates.

@Penabur_Garam. I'm just saying...it's a pretty shit game except for the story and the amount of waifus. And what brings out the waifu collectors more than doujins featuring the characters? @Seraph03 I never said it the game was dying so cool you can stop being such a fanboy. I'm just saying no one is playing FGO for the fun gameplay (because it sucks and it's horribly outdated). All about the waifu collecting at this point.
Gotta love fox wife tamamo. She got over hakuno and is finally giving gudao some cooch
Hello. Do u want cyber sex ? Write me on  (  litelink.at/n_hentai )  I wait 4 u
Imagine NOT cumming inside that pussy  - Fail
Didn't expect onion knight
*What does the fox say starts playing*
@sexysaxman25 lol it's funny, u know. Where did u hear that?
hell yeah fox girl
Ah, I see Guda took her up on her offer to help him "take a load off"
Tamamo is the best. She just needs more doujins with female Ritsuka. Or Hakunon. Or other Tamamos.
@sexysaxman25 *Looks at how FGO got number 1 ranking after LB6 came out* I kinda think you're wrong
Praise be the sun🍻
I like Tamamo but I’m more exited by the prospect of future Doujins with Vitch.
Pretty good.
AYYYYYE LETS GOOOOOOOOOOO
real thicc tamamo!
Well he ain’t wrong
@Penabur_Garam I’m pretty sure doujins are the only thing keeping FGO alive because of how inferior it is to every modern gacha game in every department except waifus and story.
i think someone shall start making yae guuji or baal, fate is too much already.
That cover page is a fvking poster right their!🔥
